text: Bertrand Reuzeau (born 1 April 1966) is a retired French football midfielder. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Stade Lavallois players Category:Lille OSC players Category:Montpellier HSC players Category:FC Sochaux-Montbéliard players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:France under-21 international footballers
title: Bertrand Reuzeau
